title: Red Receives the Mission
summary: Red, a teenage courier droid, is assigned a classified delivery mission by her engineer mother, Dr. Hood. She receives an encrypted data package meant for her grandmother, a retired scientist living in an isolated lunar outpost. Red accepts the mission, understanding the importance of keeping the data out of corporate hands.

title: Intercepted at the Spaceport
summary: While preparing her shuttle at the crowded spaceport, Red is approached by Agent Wolfe, a cybernetically enhanced bounty hunter working for the megacorp. Wolfe interrogates Red about her route and cargo, but Red deflects his questions and narrowly escapes after a brief chase through the docking bays.

title: Sabotage in Deep Space
summary: En route to the lunar outpost, Red discovers her shuttle's navigation system has been hacked. She repairs the system while evading automated security drones sent by Wolfe, who tracks her using a stolen signal. Red decides to disable her transponder, prioritizing stealth over speed.

title: Confrontation at the Outpost
summary: Red lands at her grandmother's outpost, only to find Wolfe waiting, having coerced the access codes from station security. Red distracts Wolfe with a decoy data package and engages him in a tense negotiation, buying time for her grandmother to decrypt the real data. Wolfe threatens to destroy the outpost if Red doesn't cooperate.

title: Escape and Revelation
summary: With her grandmother's help, Red triggers the outpost's emergency lockdown, trapping Wolfe in a containment chamber. Red and her grandmother escape through a maintenance tunnel, delivering the decrypted data to the underground resistance. Wolfe vows revenge, setting up a future confrontation as Red chooses to join the resistance, motivated by her family's legacy.
